summary: Add a standalone vampire follower to the game available for CBBE Vanilla and UNP
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=3][size=6]Anabella the Vampire[/size]

[/size][size=3]Add a standalone vampire follower to the game
available for CBBE Vanilla and UNP
[/size]
[size=3]Name: Anabella
Race: Nord Vampire
Body: CBBE Vanilla & UNP
Voiced: Female Condencending

Essensial: False
Marrigable: True
Morality: Any Crime

Class: Mage Destruction
Stats: Levels 25 - 150
Extra: 1000 Health, Stamina, & Magica
Combat Style: Battlemage

Outfit: -None-
Inventory: -None-
Stats: Vanilla
Craftable: [size=3]Vanilla[/size]
Upgradeable: [size=3]Vanilla[/size]

Weapon: Iron Dagger
Stats: Vanilla
Craftable: [size=3]Vanilla[/size]
Upgradeable: [size=3]Vanilla[/size]

[size=3][b][b]Location:
[/b][/b][size=3]Falkreath Dead Man's Drink Inn[/size]

[b]Required :
[/b]Skyrim.esm[b]
[/b]Update.esm[b]
[/b]Dawnguard.esm[b]
[/b][b]
[/b][b][b]Installation : [/b]
[/b]NMM or copy to data folder[b]

[b]Uninstall : [/b]
[/b]Remove from NMM or Delete from data folder[b]
